column5: (StepDescription: Coat -Coat a 6-oz. ramekin cup with cooking spray)
(StepDescription: Pour-Pour 1 egg into the ramekin cup)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription:  Pour-Pour 2 eggs into the ramekin cup)']

column5: (StepDescription: sprinkle -sprinkle 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: sprinkle -sprinkle 2 tablespoon of cheese on cup)']

column5: (StepDescription: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with a knife)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with hand)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: Microwave -Continue to Microwave for 15-30 more seconds or until the egg is almost set)']
[' (StepDescription: Line -Line the bottom piece of the English muffin with lettuce)']

column5: (StepDescription: sprinkle -sprinkle 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: sprinkle -sprinkle 2 tablespoon of cheese on cup)']

column5: (StepDescription: Top -Top cup with 1 tablespoon of salsa)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Top -Top cup with 2 tablespoon of salsa)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: Place -Place the egg from the cup over the lettuce)']
[' (StepDescription: replace -replace the top of the English muffin)']
